title: Beef 'n' mushroom pasta bake
ingredients: ['225g pasta', '450g lean minced beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms', '1 pinch garlic salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '850g passata', '225g mature Cheddar cheese, grated']
